TWINPACT ■ Each player puts all creatures from their mana zone into the battle zone. Ignore any effects that are triggered when those creatures are put into the battle zone. (Abilities that trigger during the turn such as Mach Fighter aren't ignored.)

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Each player puts all creatures from their mana zone into the battle zone. Ignore any effects that are triggered when those creatures are put into the battle zone. (Abilities that trigger during the turn such as Mach Fighter aren't ignored.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While you are summoning this creature, you may return any number of your Jokers in the battle zone to your hand. For each Jokers returned this way, this creature costs 1 less to summon. {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature attacks, draw a card, then, discard a card from your hand. ■ Joragon Big 1 Whenever you discard a Jokers from your hand, you may use one of its abilities that start with "When you put this creature".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature, if you have 5 or more Jokers in the battle zone or your mana zone, draw 2 cards. Then you may discard a Jokers from your hand. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Destiny, Dragon Armored's Enlightenment / Heaven De Endlessa

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Your opponent's non-light creatures and spells cost 1 more to summon or cast. ■ Your light creatures and spells cost 1 less to summon or cast. They can't cost 0 or less. TWINPACT ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's shields face down.

property.name: Rules1
Rules2
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures and put it into its owner's shields face down.

Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw 2 cards. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone by a spell effect, they can't choose this one. ■ Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, after you do, you may cast that spell from your graveyard for no cost.

card.name: Bishamons Deken / 「Come from the Abyss, The Soul」

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy one of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. TWINPACT ■ Put all non-evolution creatures from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {GATE OF MOONLESS NIGHT}: When you put a Magic Tool, you may choose 2 of your Magic Tools in the battle zone and your graveyard and summon this creature from your hand or graveyard onto those 4 cards for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature gets -9000 power until the end of the turn. ■ Whenever any of your creatures attacks, if there are 4 or more cards under this creature, your opponent chooses and discards a card from their hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BAD ACTION DYNAMITE} 2 (You may reduce this creature's summon cost by 2. If you do, destroy this creature at the end of the turn.) {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature is destroyed while it's tapped, take an extra turn after this one. ■ While battling, this creature gets +5000 power.

property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ You may summon this creature from your mana zone. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put a creature from your graveyard into your mana zone. TWINPACT ■ Each player puts all cards in the battle zone into their mana zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature costs 1 less to summon for each creature in the battle zone. It can't cost 0 or less. {MACH FIGHTER} (This creature can attack tapped or untapped creatures on the turn you put it.) {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ During your turn, whenever this creature wins a battle, you can't be attacked next turn.
